name: Researcher Carrot
description: A thorough researcher, seeking the truth behind magic
story: Carrot studied tirelessly to pass the notorious Magic Research Department exam and became a professional researcher. She thought things would finally get better once she passed, but instead, she feels like she has gotten even busier.

relations.description: Carrot is concerned something may have happened to her older sister Cermia after she suddenly stopped asking for money.
Considering how difficult it is to be a researcher, Carrot cannot imagine how difficult the job of student council president must be.
Carrot helps Hazel with the Student Council's accounting in return for Hazel helping with her research.
Tamarinne often sings a lullaby for Carrot to help her sleep.

specialty.name: I'll Sleep When I'm Dead
specialty.description: All researchers develop an ability to write piles of reports without sleeping for several days.

type.name: Time Limit
type.description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.

skills.name: Swing
skills.description: Attacks with a staff, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, before detonating burn effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn.

skills.name: Flame Barrier
skills.description: At the moment the caster is attacked, grants the caster a barrier for 1 turn and burns the attacker for 1 turn. Barrier effect can only be activated once per turn, and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

enhancements.description: Increases Attack.
Increases Attack by 3%.
Increases Attack by 8%.
Increases Attack by 15%.
Increases Swing's decrease Speed effect chance.
Increases Swing's decrease Speed effect chance by 2%.
Increases Swing's decrease Speed effect chance by 5%.
Increases Swing's decrease Speed effect chance by 10%.
Increases Health.
Increases Health by 7%.
Increases Health by 15%.
Increases Health by 25%.
Increases Defense.
Increases Defense by 2%.
Increases Defense by 5%.
Increases Defense by 10%.
Increases Effectiveness of the team.
Increases Effectiveness of allies by 1%.
Increases Effectiveness of allies by 2.5%.
Increases Effectiveness of allies by 5%.
After using Flame Spurt, has a chance to grant continuous healing to the caster for 1 turn.
After using Flame Spurt, has a 20% chance to grant continuous healing to the caster for 1 turn.
After using Flame Spurt, has a 50% chance to grant continuous healing to the caster for 1 turn.
After using Flame Spurt, has a 100% chance to grant continuous healing to the caster for 1 turn.
Combat Readiness increases when using Swing.
Combat Readiness increases by 2% when using Swing.
Combat Readiness increases by 5% when using Swing.
Combat Readiness increases by 10% when using Swing.
After being attacked, if the caster is debuffed, has a chance to dispel one debuff from the caster. Can only be activated once per turn.
After being attacked, if the caster is debuffed, has a 20% chance to dispel one debuff from the caster. Can only be activated once per turn.
After being attacked, if the caster is debuffed, has a 50% chance to dispel one debuff from the caster. Can only be activated once per turn.
After being attacked, if the caster is debuffed, has a 100% chance to dispel one debuff from the caster. Can only be activated once per turn.
Increases Flame Spurt's burn effect chance.
Increases Flame Spurt's burn effect chance by 5%.
Increases Flame Spurt's burn effect chance by 13%.
Increases Flame Spurt's burn effect chance by 25%.
If the caster's Health is 80% or more when attacked, decreases damage received. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
If the caster's Health is 80% or more when attacked, decreases damage received by 5%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
If the caster's Health is 80% or more when attacked, decreases damage received by 12%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
If the caster's Health is 80% or more when attacked, decreases damage received by 20%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

buffs.name: Barrier
buffs.effect: Neutralizes some of the damage taken when attacked.

debuffs.name: Burn
debuffs.effect: Target receives huge damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.

common.name: Detonate
common.effect: Inflicts damage by activating any DoT effects inflicted on the enemy. Damage is proportional to the number of turns and number of effects.
